website_summaries.verdict: Efficient design with high-quality mechanical parts like compressor and motor. Fair price for better internal quality than others.
pros: Features a Nano blue light and dry filter to keep ice fresh and clean
One of the more modern stainless-steel designs with a sleek industrial look
Is not affected by ambient temperature, so it operates well even above or below room temperature
cons: Some complaints about cheap plastic components that break easily, and customer service not always helpful with issues regarding warranty coverage

customer_reviews.title: Keeps on making Ice!
customer_reviews.text: I plugged this ice maker in after hooking up the water supply and it has been making ice automatically ever since. Even shuts itself down when the ice bin gets full. Didn't even have to set the control panel on the front. This thing just keeps making ice. Just what I purchased it for. I couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Paul D Wilkerson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for our needs!
customer_reviews.text: We are opening a small wine bar and needed a small ice machine for waters and sangria/wine cocktails. We didn't want anything big or bulky, but wanted something that still had good ice capacity. This is perfect for our needs and very used friendly! Its compact and fits perfectly between our hand sink and dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: perfect for soda machine
customer_reviews.text: i haven't had it long but so far im liking it, i bought the ice maker for the size, I needed something big enough to hold a cold plate, for the soda fountain machine.
customer_reviews.author: steven

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: So I read the reviews for this product and some of them said not to waste your time. I took a chance and I am glad I did. I am loving it! It makes solid ice really fast.It also keeps the ice secure in the storage area without melting longer than I would have expected, especially since I have it out in my metal building. The only issue I have is the manual which is pretty much useless. Also one of the attachments is 1/2 inch instead of 3/4 inch so it doesn't fit an outside faucet. I was able to find an attachment at Lowe's which fixed the problem. I would definitely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Tim M.

customer_reviews.title: pump kept burning out
customer_reviews.text: pump burnt out after 2 months . couldnt get response from manufactor on pump b purchase fish tank pump then the switch to turn on pump went out gave up threw it on back porch
customer_reviews.author: Rick Snapp

customer_reviews.title: Best ice maker and a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love the ice maker...makes ice quickly and quietly. We have had other ice makers in the past and this one is by far the best. Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: fishm1961

customer_reviews.title: Bad Quality
customer_reviews.text: I just installed this yesterday and the manual doesn't even match the machine. So far it looks like it just keeps making ice and there is no full ice shutdown on the machine. This is not a commercial machine at first glance just based on the features it's lacking. Spend more on a good machine.
customer_reviews.author: Bryce

customer_reviews.title: Only worked a month.
customer_reviews.text: This was delivered to me on November 12. It stopped working December 12.
customer_reviews.author: nathan hughes

customer_reviews.title: Makes a lot of ice!
customer_reviews.text: Holds a lot of ice and makes a nice size. Easy to install
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: The sorriest support you cant get help
customer_reviews.text: THIS COMPANY DOES NOT SUPPORT ITS WARRANTY, IT IS IMPOSSIBLE TO BUY PARTS, GET SERVICE, DO NOT BUY THIS PIECE OF TRASH
customer_reviews.author: Margie L. Schomer

customer_reviews.title: Good deal if you don't need very much ice
customer_reviews.text: We bought this product to provide ice for our employees and also for group functions. My only complaint is on the ice scoop that came with it. It is very flimsy and is not strong enough to break the sheet of ice cubes apart.
customer_reviews.author: Leona Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Ok for the price
customer_reviews.text: Ice doesn’t break up it remains in large squares thus reducing amount of stored ice
customer_reviews.author: Jim Long

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Made very cheap. Have had lots of issues. No one knows what the error codes are. The magnet fell out that makes it operate properly, having trouble finding another one small enough.
customer_reviews.author: Ruby

customer_reviews.title: the bin looks small
customer_reviews.text: is works good not sure the bin hold 44 lb
customer_reviews.author: larry herberholz

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for home use
customer_reviews.text: Worked great from the start and has kept up with our usage. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Kristianna R. Gahn

customer_reviews.title: Dissatisfied-low quality
customer_reviews.text: Top stainless is warped, cover is flimsy, not sure how the 88lbs was measured.
customer_reviews.author: Jesus C.

customer_reviews.title: Simple to set up. Just hook up water and drain
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had it a few months now. I think it works great. You can empty it, and it’ll be full again in less than 24 hrs. It definitely has a shut off and keeps itself full at all times. People who bitch that it’s not a commercial ice maker are correct but what did you expect for this price. I’m a dog trainer in Louisiana and fill a cooler with water and about 15 Lbs of ice 6 days a week and go fishing on Sunday. I never buy ice. It holds about 30 lbs, not 44, and definitely makes enough to refill from being emptied in about 12-16 hours. I keep it in my garage
customer_reviews.author: p couget

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Worked for 3 days. Now I get an error code of E03. Will not make any more ice. Complete junk.
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: Vevor is total junk, Amazon should not sell this crap
customer_reviews.text: bought it July 2019 worked for about a month before water circulation pump failed. Tried calling manufacture, Emailing, Called Amazon, Never heard back from anyone. Cant find a replacement pump anywhere. Don't buy any thing manufactured by this company. Look at complaints with BBB
customer_reviews.author: JULIE BATY

customer_reviews.title: Cruz Soliz,
customer_reviews.text: I should have bought a bigger one this machine works beautifully
customer_reviews.author: Cruz Soliz

customer_reviews.title: Need contact number
customer_reviews.text: Garbage wont work worked for week then quit. Have no contact number.
customer_reviews.author: eugene jones

product_meta.title: VEVOR 110V Commercial Ice Maker 88LBS/24H Stainless Steel with 29lbs Storage Capacity 32 Cubes Auto Clean Freestanding for Bar Home Supermarkets, Includes Scoop and Connection Hose
product_meta.description: Kindly Note：1. The ice machine is not suitable for outdoor use. The high temperature will seriously reduce the ice production. Choose a well-ventilated area with the ambient temperature between 10°C (50°F) and 32°C (90°F). This appliance MUST be installed in an indoor area without wind, rain, water, spray, or drips. 2. The Ice Machine requires a continuous water supply with the pressure of 0. 04-0. 6 MPa (5. 8-87 psi). The temperature of the water inflow should be between 5°C (41°F) and 25°C (77°F) for proper operation. 3. Air-cooled ice machine relies on air circulation to dissipate heat, so it is necessary to reserve a certain space (5 inch for reference )before and after to facilitate heat dissipation. 4. To prevent any internal damage, it is very important to keep refrigeration units (like this one) upright throughout their journey. Please leave it standing upright and outside the box for 24 HOURS before plugging it in. 5. The filter element must be removed before using the filter, and the packaging film is torn off and then tightened. 6. Heat insulation function prevents ice cubes from melting for 5-7 hours. (The specific duration of ice cube is affected by ambient temperature. )(Suggested: Please transfer the ice cubes to refrigerator , if you don't use them instantly). 7. The adjustment only affects the next and subsequent ice making cycles. 8. When the Ice full, lights up, the appliance stops working. It will work again after you take out the ice.
feature_bullets: ❄【 powerful compressor for rapid and efficient ice making 】-equipped with a powerful 220W compressor, 88lbs/24H (40 kg) per 24H capacity Commercial Ice Maker realizes convenient and efficient ice making experience. 4*8 ice tray for 32 clear cubes one cycle in 12-18 minutes, Each is 0. 9" (22 mm) cubical, making it perfect for mixed drinks and bottles with small opening. 33lbs. (15 kg) ice storage capacity for more flexible application. Heat insulation function prevents ice cubes from melting for 5-7 hours.

❄【Heavy duty stainless steel plus ABS construction 】- built with long-lasting stainless steel, the ice machine has sleek finish and hygienic. Stainless steel finish greatly contributes to its durability, sturdiness, and longevity. Freestanding ice maker can be installed easily anywhere inside your home, pantry or restaurant. Comes with water filter, just make sure to always have a water outlet near your unit. Overall size of the ice maker is 19. 6 x 14. 5 x 32. 8 inches. 2 inch on the bottom keep ice maker away from moisture on the ground.

❄【Automatic LED control panel for easiest to operate】- advanced multi-function automatic control panel with buttons which clearly shows different functions including on/off, running mode(making, water storage, harvest, high temp, overtime), auto clean and ice Thickness adjustment. So convenient to helps control ice making process and monitors possible malfunctions.

❄【Innovative Built-in light keep ice cube fresh 】-Nano blue light and dry filter to keep clean and fresh Ice for your home or commercial business. Built-in Blue light strips, ice cubes are more convenient to observe, dazzling blue light, creating a visual aesthetic that is clean and hygienic. Works great for applications including coffee shops, hotels, Bars, KTV, supermarkets, bakeries, restaurants, cold drink shops, schools and more.

❄【Come with well-considerate accessories 】 - this ice maker comes with a full set of accessories including water filter for turn tap water into pure water, ice scoops, water Supply hose, Water Supply connector and a water draining hose. All you need is thoughtfully provided. Before first time use, Clean the ice machine and keep it in an upright position For 24 hours. One-year and 30-days return policy promised form us. You can contact us when you meet any problems, we will serve you with all our heart.
